title.bibl: Sunday Jewish Courier, Sept. 24, 1916. Jewish Socialists of the Middle West Hold Conference

div.bibl: Sunday Jewish Courier, Sept. 24, 1916. JEWISH SOCIALISTS OF THE MIDDLE WEST HOLD CONFERENCE

body.p: A conference of the Jewish socialist branches of the middle western states opened last night at 1144 South Halsted Street. The main objective of the conference is to create a stronger alliance among the Jewish socialists of the Middle West and to draw up plans for common organizational activity.

The first session of the conference was occupied mainly with the election of various committees. A banquet for the delegates was held later in the evening. Today the conference will begin its practical work.
